title: Junior Business Analyst (BA/PO)
description: Mô tả công việc
Main Responsibilities
Main Responsibilities

Requirement Analysis: Collaborate with stakeholders to gather, analyze, and clarify business requirements from clients and users.
Product Documentation: Translate business needs and stakeholders’ requests into detailed PRD, Wireframing or crafting User Stories, Use Cases, Diagrams for the development team.
Stakeholder Collaboration: Engage with internal and external stakeholders to gather feedback and understand market needs, to ensure clear understanding between the development team and stakeholders by bridging communication gaps.
Validation For Testing: Work closely with the QC team to validate that product deliverable meet the business requirements, assisting in User Acceptance Testing (UAT) and ensuring quality deliverables.
Backlog Management: Create, maintain, and prioritize the product backlog in JIRA (or other Agile tools) to ensure the team works on the highest priority features.
Planning and Execution: Actively participate in sprint planning (Scrum) with Agile mindset, providing clear acceptance criteria for user stories, and ensuring the development team understands the requirements.
Product Deliverable: Ensure the product delivers a high-quality user experience by collaborating with UX/UI designers and ensuring the development team builds to specs. Have a keen mindset about quality of deliverable.
Continuous Improvement: Drive continuous improvement by analyzing performance data, gathering feedback, and identifying opportunities to enhance the product.

yc: Yêu cầu công việc
Requirement
Requirement

Bachelor's degree in any field is welcomed.
Minimum of 2 years of experience in professional product development for web and mobile apps.
Standard proficiency in product design tools such as Figma, Sketch, Adobe XD, Axure RP or alternatives.
Basic understanding of functional, emotional and feasible aspects of UI design, encompassing both the big picture connect the relationships within the complexities of overall designs.
Good communication and collaboration.
Ability to work independently.

Nice to have
Nice to have

Experience working on eCommerce, CRM or SaaS projects is a plus point.

Ability to optimize UI & UX performance during code-based production process.

title: Project Manager (Open for PO, BA, DM to pivot career)
description: Mô tả công việc

At OL Vietnam, we have been working with our sister company Orange Logic at empowering our Fortune 100 clients. You’ll work with a team of top developers to build flexible, scalable, and streamlined systems that will define the future of business management.

The company's flagship product is a web-based application designed to manage large-scale media libraries (photos, videos, audio files, documents...). As a direct result of 15+ years of independent R&D, Cortex is the most flexible DAM on the market and the solution chosen by Amazon, BBC, United Nations, National Geographic, WWF,…  to manage their large digital assets libraries.
WHAT DIFFERENTIATES ORANGE LOGIC
WHAT DIFFERENTIATES ORANGE LOGIC
Orange Logic is in a fairly unique and robust financial position with no debt, we are:

Independent: we can adopt a longer term vision. 
Stable: we are less affected by economic conditions. For example, there were no layoffs or compensation cuts during the Covid economic downturn. We even kept hiring!
The same core group of tech driven founders is driving the strategy today, with an obsession for the product.
Independent: we can adopt a longer term vision.
Stable: we are less affected by economic conditions. For example, there were no layoffs or compensation cuts during the Covid economic downturn. We even kept hiring!
The same core group of tech driven founders is driving the strategy today, with an obsession for the product.
YOUR MISSION
YOUR MISSION
As a Project Manager, you will ensure the successful deployment of our product releases.
As a Project Manager, you will ensure the successful deployment of our product releases.
Essential Functions:
Essential Functions:
Essential Functions:

End-to-End Release Management
Thoroughly understand the features/enhancements over our releases.
Oversee the current implementation progress and the scope of the development work.
Establish and implement project communication plans, providing status updates to affected staff and stakeholders.
Backlog Management
Collaborate with stakeholders to clarify requirements, set priorities, and plan sprints effectively.
Track project milestones; manage and account for unforeseen delays, then realigns schedules and expectations as needed.
Feature Review
Conduct functional reviews before changes are delivered to users to ensure deliverables meet the high-quality standards, especially in UX/Usability.

yc: Yêu cầu công việc
The most successful candidates for this role will have:
The most successful candidates for this role will have:
The most successful candidates for this role will have:

Excellent verbal and written communication skills, particularly in English.
A deep understanding of UI/UX and its impact on product design and development.
Proven experience in managing project delivery for a complex and cross-functional enterprise software.
Proven experience in simultaneously organizing and prioritizing multiple projects.
Technically curious and eager to understand how complex systems work.
Open-minded and willing to venture off the beaten track.
Technical background and experience to a degree would be a plus, but not mandatory.

title: CV Phát triển dịch vụ thẻ KHDN (BA thẻ) K. Ngân hàng số
description: Mô tả công việc

Thực hiện phát triển các giải pháp công nghệ, nghiệm thu sản phẩm, dịch vụ, thực hiện triển khai sản phẩm/ dịch vụ thẻ Khách hàng doanh nghiệp của Ngân hàng trên nền tảng App MB và các hệ thống liên quan
Thực hiện phát triển, nghiệm thu hạ tầng dịch vụ thẻ trên nền tảng App MBBank và các nên tảng liên quan theo đúng thiết kế giải pháp, đảm bảo end to end trải nghiệm khách hàng
Xây dựng giải pháp, nghiệm thu sản phẩm để triển khai các mô kinh doanh, hoàn thiện các loại tài liệu bàn giao cho các đơn vị liên quan để thực hiện triển khai bán và tích hợp dịch vụ với đối tác.
Thực hiện hỗ trợ xử lý các vấn đề phát sinh trong quá trình xây dựng & môi trường Production liên quan đến thiết kế sản phẩm.
Thực hiện kiểm soát chất lượng dịch vụ, thống kê, đo lường và lên kế hoạch cải tiến chất lượng dịch vụ.

yc: Yêu cầu công việc

Tốt nghiệp Đại học chuyên ngành Công nghệ thông tin, Điện tử viễn thông/Kinh tế/Tài chính Ngân hàng hoặc tương đương
Ưu tiên kinh nghiệm làm việc liên quan đến các lĩnh vực: Thương mại điện tử, thanh toán (thẻ/điện tử…), kinh tế, tài chính ngân hàng, nghiên cứu và tư vấn đầu tư.
Ưu tiên có chứng chỉ PSPO I trở lên
Kinh nghiệm BA, PO là một lợi thế
Toeic 450 hoặc chứng chỉ tương đương
